item.description:
o you are officially invited to the best Halloween party in North East.
Bring a Ghoul, or the whole Coven!
Gift Massage for Best Costume!!!
Glow Lights / Rogues Gallery / Buffet

Surprise musicians...others welcome

There will be food and drinks however whatever you bring is a plus.

Suggested Donation $ 10.00

RSVP to # 617 669 4422
or at alligerarts@gmail.com
please let us know as we have to plan ahead with the drinks.

Link to last years photos:
http://gallery.me.com...
(go to upper left corner "My Albums"
tab will bring you to all past years Halloween photo
albums...)

or visit
www.archeebald.com
item.name: Jeremy's Legendary Halloween Bash (+Beata and Lyes Birthday Party)
